itemLabel: Thomas Taylor, Baron Taylor of Gryfe

wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Johnston Taylor, Baron Taylor of Gryfe FRSE DL LLD (27 April 1912 – 13 July 2001) was a British politician and businessman. He was affectionately known as Tom Taylor.

response: * Thomas Taylor, Baron Taylor of Gryfe (1912–2001), British politician
